author: Kyle Morris
title: Pennsylvania Governor Orders Business Employees and Customers to Wear Masks
description: Pennsylvania Gov. Tom Wolf has directed businesses in the state to provide their employees with masks and has suggested that those who do not wear masks while shopping will be denied service during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Pennsylvania Gov. Tom Wolf has directed businesses in the state to provide their employees with masks and has suggested that those who do not wear masks while shopping be denied service during the coronavirus pandemic.
